title: Stones River National Battlefield: Special Exhibits
body: Special Exhibits       Stones River National Battlefield features rotating exhibits in the visitor center lobby. Check this page periodically to see what is currently on exhibit and a schedule for upcoming presentations. Right Now Lady in Blue: Francis Clalin Coming Up John Savage's Battle of Murfreesboro Monument (May 1, 2011 - October 31, 2011)  Â    Past Exhibits  Listening to the Landscape: The Stories of Stones River National Battlefield Music of the Civil War: Harmony and Discord
